{html}

I found this behavior in an app I am building and it also present in the KitchenSink example for a tableView with TextField or Text Area.

Once you focus on a text field in a tableview Extra space is added to the bottom of the tableview. Once you blur you are lft with quite a bit of empty scrolling area at the bottom.
Doesn't seem like another Row, it just seems like the Tableview hadd padding on the bottom.
